originalText.text: I would definitely recommend this Daycare Center. Rosa and Stephanie always have a smile on they faces no matter how the parents are with they tone of voices. I would definitely recommend this Daycare Center for my child. Everytime I go to pick up my child the Lead Teacher and Assistant Teachers always let me know how my child day went from the beginning to the day of the day. My child diaper is always dry never wet. The staff is very friendly and helpful from ages 3 months old to 5 years old.

originalText.text: I am the lead teacher of the age group of 2s and let me just say that I care and nurture my students as if they were my own. My Students are the reason I have become a wonderful teacher and I am thankful for Rosa, the director, for giving me this opportunity for being a part of this wonderful site. The safety and caring of my babies comes first and they are the reason I smile daily. It takes a big heart to shape little minds and my babies know it. Both the director and the director assistant are always helping out no matter what. It is not good to judge someone without knowing them because you never know what they go through.

originalText.text: My nephew attends this facility and I can say by far they have some of the most caring staff. I've always had a pleasant experience when dropping off or picking him up, the staff makes you feel welcomed. My nephew enjoys going to school and every time I drop him off he's greeted with open arms and smile. He runs inside yelling bye, which let's me know that he enjoys being there. When I have a child of my own, I'd definitely bring them here

originalText.text: I just want to say everyone experience is different. With my Son it has been great. My son been with the daycare since he was 6 months old. At first I was very nervous and scared because you hear so many bad rumors about putting you child in daycare. But I had to go back to work and I had no one to take care of my child so I have no choice. But surprisingly it was the best experience for my son and I. My son never leaves there with a wet or dirty diaper. He felt in love with each teacher he was given, from Lisa to Kim to Anna and Shannon and now with Ms. Em who he adores dearly. They each took care of my child as if he was their own. They learned my child likes and dislikes and  how to put him to sleep with ease. And they always make sure he eats. I was very scared with that. Once my son gets there he jumps out his stroller to run to them and his peers. He has made many of friends and it has help in even on the outside when I take him to the park. He has learn to share and draw. Art and crafts which he loves. Every month he comes home with a big folder with all the work he did in that past month. They take them on trips and to the park. I cannot said anything bad because they have been so good to my son and I. Even the staff Rosa and Stephanie. I appreciate each and every one of you ladies and I am so happy Knowing my son is at such a safe place. Most importantly you want people who gonna take care of your child with love because taking care of children is not an easy job. You need to have major patiences and love what you do. I recommend this daycare to all parents. Especially if they start there from young, the younger the better. Thank you friends and family

originalText.text: Overheard the teacher talking to my 18 month child in a demanding voice.  ( she didn't know i was listening nor in the building )She denied it. Parents aren't allowed in the class room only at the door and cant stand in doorway. Only allowed to look through a small window. They don't even let you know when they change your child teacher ( due to  different age groups ) I wouldn't recommend this child care facility. P.S THEY ARE UNDER INVESTIGATION. The other reviews clearly are from management to up their reputation from my one comment. A mother should be notified when changes in the child schedule happens. If you don't ask you don't know. Check their results at OFCS
